restart: YOU ARE ABOUT TO DELETE YOUR PROGRESS, DO YOU WANT TO PROCEED?

levels.title: Logical
levels.hint: Step on the red.

levels.title: Don't touch it
levels.hint: Why did you touch it? Restart the level.

levels.title: Do not touch it
levels.hint: I told you not to touch it.

levels.title: Don't touch
levels.hint: Don't touch ANYTHING!

levels.title: Hold
levels.hint: Patience is not your thing, wait on the button and I'll give you the answer.

levels.title: Waiter! The menu?
levels.hint: Broaden your horizons, the menu is not inside the room.
levels.menuText: Use the arrows to choose the dish you like and click on it :)

levels.title: You've had one too many
levels.hint: One of the four buttons opens the door, don't drink more or the controls will change again.

levels.title: Push
levels.hint: Bull mentality, the wood is your weak point.

levels.title: Press it
levels.hint: Have you tried with your right hand, mouse?

levels.title: Have you forgotten something?
levels.hint: The clue is in the previous room.

levels.title: At the same time!
levels.hint: Step and click.

levels.title: Telekinesis
levels.hint: Drag the door with the "mind."

levels.title: It's stuck
levels.hint: I think if you keep trying, you can unstuck the button.

levels.title: The button is here
levels.hint: Where is the button?

levels.title: Roles reversed
levels.hint: Press the character.

levels.title: It's a beautiful night
levels.hint: Look for the starry night in the room.

levels.title: Follow the path
levels.hint: Find the path to the door after pressing the 2 buttons.

levels.title: It stinks
levels.hint: The character runs away from you.

levels.title: Left, right, up, down
levels.hint: Itâ€™s not a sequence.

levels.title: Knock Knock
levels.hint: I think there is no doorbell, how can I knock?

levels.title: Better go home
levels.hint: Waiter! The main menu?

levels.title: Looks are deceiving
levels.hint: Everything is closed, or maybe not?

levels.title: Password: 1627
levels.hint: Waiter! How much is the bill?

levels.title: Worker
levels.hint: Look at the walls, does it have something to do with the hammer?

levels.title: Time is running out
levels.hint: Wait and... run!

levels.title: Go with the flow
levels.hint: I think the button has no power.

levels.title: Surrender
levels.hint: Waiter! Can I have seconds?

levels.title: All on green
levels.hint: Bet on the green buttons.

levels.title: Improvise the exit
levels.hint:
The sign can't tell you where to exit!
You tell the sign where you want to exit!
levels.note:
In reality, there is no exit.

Don't get your hopes up.

levels.title: Simon Says
levels.hint: Copy the sequence.

levels.title: Don't look at me
levels.hint: The door is shy.

levels.title: Traffic light
levels.hint:
Green: Go
Yellow: I'm going to turn red
Red: Stop!

levels.title: Emergency exit
levels.hint: The sign indicates the exit, leave through the "door."

levels.title: Use the button
levels.hint: You won't be able to open this door alone.

levels.title: Remember, don't touch it
levels.hint: I thought we were past this...

levels.title: Crawl
levels.hint: Move with the power of the "mind."

levels.title: Revolving door
levels.hint: Who says door means exit.

levels.title: Discover it
levels.hint: Discover the secret button, it's planted nearby.

levels.title: Incubate it
levels.hint: Incubate the button.

levels.title: I'm loaded
levels.hint: The door is already open ;)

levels.title: Flashlight
levels.hint: You see it, you look away, and you don't see it.

levels.title: Interior designer
levels.hint: The door would look divine if it didn't block the entrance.
Looks like you have to solve an anagram.
levels.note:
How long have you been here?

Still can't escape?

Do loops ever end?

levels.hint: Left = Right = Up = Down.

levels.title: Go down to go up
levels.hint: Go down, downnn.

levels.title: Needs weight
levels.hint: That pot looks heavy.

levels.title: Beyond the walls
levels.hint: Broaden your horizons, the right path is in the forest.

levels.title: Touch yourself
levels.hint: Come on, don't be shy mouse, touch yourself.

levels.title: Tinder
levels.hint:
Do you like it? Give it a Like
Don't like it? Swipe left.

levels.title: Kill it
levels.hint: Look what you've made me do...

levels.title: Kill yourself
levels.hint: Step on the red.
